title: S2 Ep19: Better seeds or better insurance?
itunes:title: Better seeds or better insurance?
description: Extreme weather doesn't just ruin one crop: it means that the following year small farmers won't have income to invest. Better seeds and insurance against this sort of bad luck are partial solutions, but what if we combine them in one package? Paswel Marenya tells Tim Phillips about a successful multi-year trial in Tanzania and Mozambique.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
